question: 失敗
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>fault</kanji> and a <kanji>failure</kanji>, all in one. This must have been one big <vocabulary>failure</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>mistake</vocabulary> you've made.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. The <ja>失</ja> gets shortened, though. Don't make that <ja>失敗</ja>.
